Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near La Rabida Hospital (6501 S Promontory Dr)
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th and South Shore Terminal: due to a Marathon near La Rabida Hospital (6501 S Promontory Dr).

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th and South Shore Terminal: due to a Marathon near La Rabida Hospital (6501 S Promontory Dr).

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
